attributes.action: call a General Election to give a him a democratic mandate if Gordon Brown simply "succeeds" Tony Blair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A petition to require Gordon Brown to call a general election in order to give his position a democratic mandate in the event that he simply succeeds Tony Blair as Prime Minister without a popular democratic process being followed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
